price: Huu ni ukumbusho. Na hakika wachamngu wana marudio mazuri.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ
footnotes: Haya tuliyo kusimulia ni khabari za baadhi ya Mitume ili kukukumbusha wewe na kuwakumbusha watu wako. Na hakika wachamngu walio jikinga na kumuasi Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu watapata marejeo mazuri na natija njema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
